items.name: Kashmiri Khatte Baingan
items.description: Baby egg plants cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, fennel seed, tamarind and other spices. A dish hailing from the northern part of Kashmir.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Shalgam Gosht
items.description: A traditional dish made with lamb and turnips. The tender pieces of meat are cooked with flavorful spices and the turnips add a slightly sweet and earthy flavor to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Paneer Pakoda
items.description: A popular Indian snack made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that is coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to crispy perfection.

items.name: Chicken Pulao
items.description: A popular dish made with fragrant basmati rice and tender pieces of chicken cooked in a flavorful broth with a blend of aromatic spices. The dish is garnished with fried onions, nuts, and fresh herbs, giving it a beautiful texture and taste.

items.name: Bhogichi Bhaji
items.description: Bhogichi Bhaji is a traditional Maharashtrian dish made by cooking a variety of vegetables in a spicy coconut-based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kolambi Bhat
items.description: Flavourful prawns cooked with ginger, garlic, onion and other spices combined with aromatic basmati rice and fresh coriander served wih yogurt dip + papad + achar

items.name: Kothimbir Vadi
items.description: A popular Maharashtrian snack made from chickpea flour (besan), fresh coriander leaves (kothimbir), and various spices. It's typically steamed, sliced into pieces, and then shallow-fried until crispy, resulting in a savory treat

items.name: Phodni Bhat
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish, is a flavorful rice preparation where cooked rice is infused with a tempering (phodni) of mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves, peanuts, and spices.

items.name: üå¥On Vacation üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
items.description: I will be back with an exciting new menu from the 18th of March.

items.name: Enchorer Dalna
items.description: A delectable Bengali dish featuring tender pieces of unripe green jackfruit simmered in a flavorful gravy infused with an array of spices such as turmeric, cumin, and ginger accompanied by potatoes. This vegetarian delight captivates with its rich aroma and satisfying taste, making it a cherished favorite among Bengali cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bengali Chicken Chaap
items.description: A succulent dish originating from Kolkata, featuring marinated chicken cooked in a creamy yogurt-based gravy infused with aromatic spices, offering a tantalizing blend of flavors that delights the palate.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Paneer Kathi Roll
items.description: A flavorful Indian street food where marinated and grilled paneer (Indian cottage cheese) is wrapped in a soft flatbread (roti or paratha) along with fresh vegetables and chutney.

items.name: Kichuri
items.description: A flavorful dish made with rice, lentils, mixed vegetables, and aromatic spices.

items.name: Shahi Paneer
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in buttery creamy gravy made with onion, toamto, cashew and spices. Topped with some fresh cream, garam masala and coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Saag Chicken
items.description: A delicious Indian dish where tender chicken pieces are simmered in a flavorful spinach-based gravy, boasting a harmonious blend of spices and herbs, creating a hearty and nutritious meal that's cherished in Indian cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Aloo Tikki Chaat
items.description: Potato patty fried and served with spicy and flavourful chickpea gravy topped with sweet and tangy tamrind sauce and spicy green chutney, onion, pomagrante seeds, fresh coriander, sev and chaat masala. A lip smacking snack found on the streets of India. (2 patties)

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Veg Jaipuri
items.description: A dish from Rajasthan made with a mix of vegetables cooked together with red chili and tomato paste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Bhuna Kukad
items.description: A classic Indian dish featuring tender pieces of chicken cooked with an array of spices and aromatics until the flavors are deeply infused, resulting in a rich and flavorful gravy, making it a beloved choice among enthusiasts of Indian cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Mirchi Vada
items.description: A popular Indian street food snack that originated in Rajasthan. It consists of large green chili peppers that are stuffed with a spiced potato filling, coated in a chickpea flour batter, and then deep-fried until crispy and golden brown. Served with a side of green chutney. (4 vadas)

items.name: Kadhi Chawal
items.description: Kadhi is a yogurt based gravy typically made with a mixture of yogurt, besan (gram flour), and spices. Served with chawal (rice).

items.name: Paneer Lababdar Biryani
items.description: A fragrant and indulgent Indian rice dish, marrying the creamy richness of paneer lababdar with aromatic biryani spices, creating a symphony of flavors in every bite. Served with raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Donne Biryani
items.description: Made with fragrant long-grain basmati rice, tender pieces of chicken and a blend of spices including cumin, coriander, cardamom, cinnamon, and bay leaves. The dish is garnished with fried onions, fresh coriander leaves, and a squeeze of lemon juice. Donne Biryani is known for its distinctive and complex flavors

items.name: Panner 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer where cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) are marinated in a spicy mixture of yogurt and aromatic spices, then deep-fried until crispy and golden brown, resulting in a flavorful and crunchy snack

items.name: Panner Bhurji
items.description: A delicious Indian dish made by scrambling crumbled paneer (Indian cottage cheese) with onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and a blend of aromatic spices like turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Served with 2 chapati.

items.name: Veg Chopper Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish made by cooking chopped vegetables like carrots, beans and cabbage along with rice and a blend of spices. It is topped with a spicy flavourful mix veg Indo-chinese gravy.

items.name: Chicken Chopper Rice
items.description: An Indo-Chinese dish made by cooking egg and chopped vegetables like carrots, beans and cabbage along with rice and a blend of spices. A popular dish served with a spicy delicious chicken gravy on top of the rice.

items.name: Gobi Manchurian
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with crispy fried cauliflower florrets tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce. It's a perfect vegetarian appetizer.

items.name: Aloo Ki Thechwani
items.description: A traditional dish from the Indian state of Uttarakhand, made with boiled potatoes and a blend of spices, including red chili and mustard oil, creating a rustic and spicy potato curry. Served with a portion of rice.
